# barcodeqrysws
A barcode generator so small it can fit into a QR code. Made for Hack Club YSWS, Say Cheese

The code in base64:
```html
data:text/html;base64,
```

The main point of this HC YSWS was to make a small file that could fit into a QR Code. So I was like, why not make a QR code that makes a barcode? Seems quite supplementary.

So here you go.

There's a single HTML file, which I've converted to data url w b64.
